thread.title: iboss Hires Chris Kasper as COO and CFO

author: cnbc.com
title: iboss Hires Chris Kasper as COO and CFO
text:
Former CEO of Harvest Power Set to Accelerate Company Growth
BOSTON--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- iboss , a cloud-based cybersecurity company and the leading provider of web gateway as a service, announced today that it has hired Christian G. Kasper as Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer. Kasper joins iboss during a period of rapid growth for the company and will leverage his experience helping companies scale to meet increasing customer demands.
Prior to joining iboss, Kasper was President and CEO of Harvest Power, Inc., an organics sustainability company named five times to the Global Cleantech 100 and one of Fast Company’s 50 Most Innovative Companies. He has also served as CFO of several companies, including The Princeton Review, Inc., a global education and test preparation company. At both companies, Kasper developed a passion and expertise for building the capabilities of mid-size businesses that were at the leading edge of their respective industries.
In addition to his experience at Harvest Power and The Princeton Review, Kasper has worked with companies in several industries, including retail and consumer commercial goods, which will benefit iboss as it continues to expand its commercial business.
Powered by the Distributed Gateway Platform, the industry’s only web gateway as a service specifically designed to solve the challenges of securing distributed organizations, iboss has achieved robust customer growth, and with the addition of Kasper is poised to continue that trend in 2018.
“iboss has great momentum and the potential to transform the way cybersecurity is delivered,” said Chris Kasper, COO and CFO, iboss. “I’m looking forward to helping the company reach its full potential.”
“We’re very excited to welcome Chris to the iboss team. He brings extensive experience in building companies which will prove invaluable at iboss,” said Paul Martini, CEO and co-founder of iboss. “I look forward to working with Chris as we continue to meet the challenges of growing customer and workforce demands.”
About iboss
iboss has created the first and only web gateway subscription service specifically designed to solve the challenge of securing distributed organizations. Built for the cloud, the iboss Distributed Gateway Platform leverages an elastic, cloud-based architecture that provides advanced security for today’s decentralized organizations with more financial predictability. Backed by more than 100 patents and patents pending, and protecting over 4,000 organizations worldwide, iboss is one of the fastest growing cloud-based cybersecurity companies in the world. To learn more, visit www.iboss.com .
